name: Solitaire ±
description:
Solitaire by Megarama is the classic Klondike solitaire game that you know and love. Challenge yourself to sharpen your mind or just play to unwind and relax with the most popular card game in the world!

Features:
• Classic Klondike Solitaire gameplay
• Customizable card and table design
• Game Statistics to track progress
• Use hints and undo's if you’re stuck.
• Auto-complete option
• Stunning HD Graphics
• Tablet support

Install now to play the classic solitaire game that you’ve been looking for!
